document.full_text: u-prince  - haiti's former president jean-bertrand aristide arrived back in his caribbean homeland friday, returning from exile in south africa just days before a crucial haitian presidential election.
document.title: aristide arrives back in haiti
lines_and_colors: u-prince  - haiti's former president jean-bertrand aristide arrived back in his caribbean homeland friday, returning from exile in south africa just days before a crucial haitian presidential election.
